org.acra.builder

Class ReportBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.acra.builder.ReportBuilder

  • public final class ReportBuilder
extends Object
    Fluent API used to assemble the different options used for a crash report.
    Since:
    4.8.0

      • customData

        @NonNull
public ReportBuilder customData(@NonNull
                                         Map<String,String> customData)
        Sets additional values to be added to ReportField.CUSTOM_DATA. Values specified here take precedence over globally specified custom data.
        Parameters:
        customData - a map of custom key-values to be attached to the report
        Returns:
        the updated ReportBuilder

      • customData

        @NonNull
public ReportBuilder customData(@NonNull
                                         String key,
                                         String value)
        Sets an additional value to be added to ReportField.CUSTOM_DATA. The value specified here takes precedence over globally specified custom data.
        Parameters:
        key - the key identifying the custom data
        value - the value for the custom data entry
        Returns:
        the updated ReportBuilder

      • getCustomData

        @NonNull
public Map<String,String> getCustomData()
        Returns:
        a map with all custom data

      • sendSilently

        @NonNull
public ReportBuilder sendSilently()
        Forces the report to be sent silently, ignoring all interactions
        Returns:
        the updated ReportBuilder

        if this should send silently
